'''TU1''' is a version of ''[[Xbox 360 Edition]]'' released on May 9, 2012.<ref>{{Citation|url=http://playxbla.com/announcing-arcade-next-and-the-minecraft-release-date/|title=Announcing ARCADE NEXT (and the Minecraft release date!)|website=www.playxbla.com|date=March 24, 2012|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20120606124334/http://playxbla.com/announcing-arcade-next-and-the-minecraft-release-date}}</ref><ref>{{Citation|url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ALxBfQwSyRU|title= Minecraft for xbox 360 lets play: part 1 (spawning and starting up) - ibxtoycat|website=www.youtube.com|date=May 9, 2012}}</ref> This version is based on [[Java Edition Beta 1.6.6]]. This was the day-one patch for consoles.
